summary: 查询Prometheus实例（仅支持aliyun-cs、ecs两种类型的实例）的指定Remote Write配置项。

schema.title: prometheus实例id
schema.description: Prometheus实例ID。仅支持aliyun-cs、ecs两种类型的实例。

RemoteWriteYaml.title:
prometheus remote write配置（yaml格式），示例：
remote_write:
  - name: rw1
    url: "http://cn-hangzhou-intranet.arms.aliyuncs.com/prometheus/uid/xx/cn-hangzhou/api/v3/write"
    basic_auth:
      username: xxx
      password: xxx
    write_relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [ instance_id ]
        separator: ;
        regex: si
        replacement: $1
        action: keep
RemoteWriteYaml.example: 参见返回参数补充说明。

Data.example:
name: rw1
url: "http://cn-hangzhou-intranet.arms.aliyuncs.com/prometheus/uid/xx/cn-hangzhou/api/v3/write"
basic_auth: username: xxx
password: xxx
write_relabel_configs: - source_labels: [instance_id]
separator: ;
regex: si
replacement: $1
action: keep

Success.description:
查询是否成功。

- `true`：成功。
- `false`：失败。

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

title: 查询Prometheus实例的指定Remote Write配置项
responseParamsDescription:
RemoteWriteYaml示例值：
```
remote_write:
  - name: rw1
    url: "http://cn-hangzhou-intranet.arms.aliyuncs.com/prometheus/uid/xx/cn-hangzhou/api/v3/write"
    basic_auth:
      username: xxx
      password: xxx
    write_relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [ instance_id ]
        separator: ;
        regex: si
        replacement: $1
        action: keep
```
